desc: Here at Straight Cozy we believe in the warmth and comfort a candle gives to the mind and body. Our goal is to create an ambiance and atmosphere that will amplify the word COZY. With all natural, responsibly sourced materials and luxurious fragrances we know you'll be #StraightCozy once you light the wick.

layout.text: Welcome to Straight Cozy Candle Co.
